pages.text: Enderwire sensors is category of special blocks, that will propagate events when world state changes respectively.$(p)All of sensors have disable/enable events.

pages.title: Enderwire lever
pages.text: Lever, that connected to enderwire network. Will populate turn off/turn on events and also, state of lever can be observed via $(o)getNetworkElementState$() from network connector

pages.title: Enderwire button
pages.text: Button, that connected to enderwire network. Will populate turn off/turn on events and also, state of button can be observed via $(o)getNetworkElementState$() from network connector.$(p)$(l)Note$(): button cannot be unpressed, it will be unpressed automatically

pages.title: Enderwire pressure plate
pages.text: Pressure plate, that connected to enderwire network. Will populate turn off/turn on events and also, state of plate can be observed via $(o)getNetworkElementState$() from network connector
